upgrade.info: Version 1.5.8 fixes a bug in the handling of attachments of pages that have a name with spaces in it.
Version 1.5.7 is a minor update that solves the problem that the page did not auto-update after edit on some computers.
Version 1.5 adds drag-and-drop in the edit window to create links to local files and embed images. Fixes some problems with local linking.
Version 1.5 adds drag-and-drop in the edit window to create links to local files and embed images. Fixes some problems with local linking.
The new version remembers the window position between sessions and adds Ctrl+E as a shortcut key to edit a page.
Version 1.1 has better error recovery possibilities.
